metadata.title: ELSA-2022-5942:  vim security update (MODERATE)
metadata.description:
[8.2.2637-16.0.1.3]
- Remove upstream references [Orabug: 31197557]

[2:8.2.2637-16.3]
- CVE-2022-1785 vim: Out-of-bounds Write
- CVE-2022-1897 vim: out-of-bounds write in vim_regsub_both() in regexp.c
- CVE-2022-1927 vim: buffer over-read in utf_ptr2char() in mbyte.c

[2:8.2.2637-16.2]
- CVE-2022-1621 vim: heap buffer overflow
- CVE-2022-1629 vim: buffer over-read

[2:8.2.2637-16.1]
- CVE-2022-0554 vim: Use of Out-of-range Pointer Offset in vim prior
- CVE-2022-0943 vim: Heap-based Buffer Overflow occurs in vim
- CVE-2022-1154 vim: use after free in utf_ptr2char
- CVE-2022-1420 vim: Out-of-range Pointer Offset

[2:8.2.2637-15]
- CVE-2022-0714 vim: buffer overflow [rhel-9]

[2:8.2.2637-14]

[2:8.2.2637-12]
- CVE-2022-0368 vim: Out-of-bounds Read in vim
- CVE-2022-0417 vim: heap-based-buffer-overflow in ex_retab() of src/indent.c
- CVE-2022-0408 vim: Stack-based Buffer Overflow in spellsuggest.c

[2:8.2.2637-12]
- CVE-2022-0319 vim: heap-based out-of-bounds read
- CVE-2022-0361 vim: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository

[2:8.2.2637-11]
- CVE-2022-0261 vim: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in block_insert() in src/ops.c

[2:8.2.2637-7]

[2:8.2.2637-6]

- 2004976 - CVE-2021-3796 vim: use-after-free in nv_replace() in normal.c [rhel-9.0]
